description: Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) is soliciting industry feedback on behalf of Transport Canada (TC) for a web-based Geographic Information System (GIS) Solution, to replace the current solution in support of the Enhanced Maritime Situational Awareness (EMSA) Initiative.
duration_in_months: It is expected that the contract will last from approximately 28 months.
full_summary:
# Request for Information: Web-Based Geographic Information System (GIS) Solution

## Solicitation Information

* **Solicitation Number** : WS4158955834
* **Publication Date** : August 23, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date** : September 26, 2023, 2:00 PM EDT
* **Expected Contract Start Date** : June 1, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date** : May 31, 2026

## Overview

Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) on behalf of Transport Canada (TC), is seeking input from industry stakeholders on a web-based Geographic Information System (GIS) solution to support the Enhanced Maritime Situational Awareness (EMSA) Initiative.

## Solution Requirements

The requested solution should:

* Provide a cloud-based software as a service for maritime situational awareness
* Offer a Geographic Information System (GIS) platform that can handle large datasets and provide real-time data visualization
* Integrate with existing systems and infrastructure
* Ensure data security and compliance with relevant regulations

## Pre-Proposal Meeting

A pre-proposal meeting is planned to facilitate discussions between PSPC and interested industry stakeholders. Details of the meeting will be announced in the future.

## Contact Information

Chandramoorthy, Cinduja (SPAC/PSPC)
Email: cinduja.chandramoorthy@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

## Notice Documents

The solicitation documents are available at:

https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17246667?extsite=MTcyNDY2NjdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

No attachments are provided.

## Related Documents

The following trade agreements apply to this solicitation:

* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Panama
